channel.title: tomomi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in tomomi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: met Lin's friend Tomomi
item.description: 16:55 Tuesday 21 June 2016 JST Tomomi, Lin’s friend from her ex-work, is my third Tomomi to know now, though I don’t think I’ll stay close in touch with her since she’s Lin’s friend. We ate yummy quinoa, salad, bread, and ice cream! Tomomi asked me about my barefootedness and I asked about her job and how things are going at Lin’s old job.

item.title: email to Tomomi
item.description: 05:54 Tuesday 02 February 2016 CST Thank you Tomomi! Our trip has been great, and I look forward to telling you lots of stories!! (*) See you soon! Rob (*) story prompts: barefoot in Narita San Diego wedding AJ from men’s group Jason didn’t know bowling skydiving steak at Dude’s kT 15 minutes Mt Bonnell wedding steak restaurant four dogs front yard tree trampolines Sally music
